longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  for at least 3 months beyond the period of intended stay. 
Admission and Transit Restrictions:
- Admission refused to holders of non-biometric passports
  issued to nationals of Albania. 

Visa required.

Visa Issuance:
- Holders of an entry permit letter (visa letter) issued by
  Nauru. Applications can be submitted to visa@naurugov.nr .
Additional Information:
- Visitors must hold confirmed accommodation and documents
  required for their next destination. 
Warning:
- Visitors must hold return/onward tickets
vaccination:
Vaccination against yellow fever required if arriving within 6
days after leaving or transiting countries with risk of yellow
fever transmission For details, click here.

Exempt from Yellow Fever vaccination:
- Children under 1 year of age.
